subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Valentine, the manager of the Red Sox, agreed with a lot of team’s fans and some of his own players before Saturday’s 4-1 victory against the Yankees: he hasn’t done a great job.
snippet: Bobby Valentine, the manager of the Red Sox, agreed with a lot of team’s fans and some of his own players before Saturday’s 4-1 victory against the Yankees: he hasn’t done a great job.
